reviewText: Good looking couples, interesting techniques, but I found the sound to be a problem: Often the music was too loud and overrode the narration.

As someone who finds it easier to learn touch and massage techniques by watching and doing, I appreciated the availability of the dvds. Each time you watch you might find something you missed first time. Very erotic without being pornographic. I have incorporated my learning from these, into my sensual massage. An excellent resource for individuals and couples who wish to share erotic touch with each other or share with others.
